name: Teamrun
tagline: first and only multiplayer running game to keep pace with friends running real time in remote locations
body:
![screenshot](https://raw.github.com/jdimatteo/TeamRun/gh-pages/images/iphone_white_4s_main_screen.png)

* social element to motivate exercise: studies show running with a friend increases miles ran by 53% and calories burned by 66%
* optional pace scaling so runners of different abilities can still motivate each other to maintain a target pace 
* configurable audio pace and ahead/behind notifications while you run 
* track distance ran and pace, with personal bests recorded, and leaderboards to compete with other runners 
* team miles leaderboard: the more people you run with, the more team miles you earn 
* global weekly Sunday TeamRun at 11 AM eastern standard time 
* completely free with no ads and no in app purchases
* open source

### Support
Having trouble with TeamRun? View and create issues at https://github.com/jdimatteo/TeamRun/issues or contact dev@teamrun.org and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
